column1: The Pit Room////We bought the brisket and sausage with charro beans. Had more than enough food for three adults! My daughter even made a sandwich for lunch the next day with the remaining meat. Very delicious and tender! The sauce (on the side) was delightful
column2: too! The sausage was nicely seasoned. We didn't ask for the bread
column3: but that would have been nice to have.
